com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.swipe.impl

类 SwipeItemMangerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.swipe.impl.SwipeItemMangerImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SwipeItemMangerInterface 

    public class SwipeItemMangerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SwipeItemMangerInterface
    SwipeItemMangerImpl is a helper class to help all the adapters to maintain open status.
